Body:
Description: Buenos Dias, estamos trabajando en montar un servidor on-premise de un entorno de Enpoint Protector, para utilizar las funcionalidades de DLP, estuvimos viendo los detalle de la pagina y no estamos viendo el proceso de instalaci√≥n en Proxmox, les agradeceria si nos pueden brindar una ayuda para montar el servidor en un entorno virtualizado de proxmox.

Saludos.
Next Steps Updated: A remote session will be scheduled with the customer.
What We've Learned Updated: The customer asked for help in order to deploy the EPP VM in Proxmox.

What We've Learned Updated: 4/17/2025

- Joined remote session
- Customer configured the VM 
- Customer can not connect to EPP UI console
- Accessed backend and Emil discovered that user did not configure second NIC card
- User configured the virtual hardware via Proxmox to include second NIC
- Completed Network connfiguration from VM UI.
- Customer now able to log into EPP UI without issue

* Customer has a question on how to add Linux users 

The customer asked for help in order to deploy the EPP VM in Proxmox.
Next Steps Updated: Looking into how to add Linux users and will report back to customer with steps

- Sent customer information on users and groups via email
